action.text: Amendment 4820, previously agreed to, was modified by by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4820 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4820 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S4844; text: CR S4844) To improve the bill.
